definition: to mix/to mingle/muddled/to drift along/to muddle along/to pass for/to get along with sb/thoughtless/reckless

sentences.english: Increased turbidity in a culture is another index of growth.
sentences.chinese: 混濁度的增加是另外一個生長的指標。

sentences.english: A simple system has been developed for the clinical grading of the presence and severity of lens opacities.
sentences.chinese: 晶體混濁及嚴重程度有一簡單的臨牀分級方法。

sentences.english: The once clear mountain stream is now polluted and opaque .
sentences.chinese: 曾經是很清澈的山溪，現在受到污染變得混濁了。

sentences.english: When producing Anli pear turbid juice, the most efficious stabilizer is 0.
sentences.chinese: 安梨混濁果汁生產中，穩定劑以0。

sentences.english: A waxy cloud or haze appears in the liquid.
sentences.chinese: 在液體中出現蠟點或混濁。

sentences.english: Cloudy pear juice and cloudy peach juice in this study have a shelf life of approximately 6months.
sentences.chinese: 實驗中，梨和桃子的混濁汁的貨架期大約爲6個月。

sentences.english: She stared at the mud-browned chilly water in the lake.
sentences.chinese: 她凝眸望著混濁不堪的冰冷的湖水。

sentences.english: The corneal thickness gradually increased and directly related to the degree of the corneal muddiness.
sentences.chinese: 角膜混濁與角膜厚度呈正相關。

sentences.english: To study the influence of antioxidant vitamin intake on radiant lens opacities.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲探討抗氧化維生素對輻射性晶體混濁的影響。

sentences.english: Non-biological hazes in beer were discussed in this article.
sentences.chinese: 討論了啤酒的非生物混濁。

sentences.english: The most common types of cataract were cortical and posterior subcapsular opacities .
sentences.chinese: 最常見的白內障種類是皮質性和後囊的水晶體混濁。

sentences.english: Among other things, plasticisers were substituted for palm oil as clouding agents in drinks.
sentences.chinese: 塑化劑代替了棕櫚油作爲飲料中的混濁劑。

sentences.english: His urine is cloudy and it smells strong.
sentences.chinese: 他的小便混濁，而且氣味不好。

sentences.english: Real honey printing opacity strong, color even and unanimous, and inferior honey muddy having impurity.
sentences.chinese: 純正的蜂蜜色澤均一，劣質蜂蜜因摻雜所以色澤混濁。

sentences.english: He looked up at Mr. Button with
sentences.chinese: 他擡起頭來用一雙混濁無神的眼睛疑惑地看着巴頓。

sentences.english: The irritation and aggravation of the cornea leads to corneal opacities that impair vision.
sentences.chinese: 對角膜的刺激及惡化可導致影響視力的角膜混濁。

definition: wisps of blood/visible veins/(of eyes) bloodshot
to turn pale/to lose color/to go white
